text.name: JK Carpenters s.r.o
text.companyRegistrationNumber: OR OS Trnava, odd. s.r.o, vložka č. 37438/T
text.office: PPD Trhové Mýto, Dolnobarská 407.930 13 Trhová Hradská

/home.homeHeaderText:
JK-Carpenters creates custom, high-quality

furniture and carpentry solutions.

We bring your ideas to life with expertise.

custom_furniture.label: Custom Furniture
custom_furniture.text: Carpentry, custom furniture, kitchen furniture, living room furniture, sliding door wardrobes, wardrobes, office furniture, bathroom furniture, built-in wardrobes, children's room furniture, shelving systems, windows, and doors.

interior_joinery.label: Interior Joinery
interior_joinery.text: Complete execution of interior joinery (survey, custom furniture design, manufacturing, delivery, on-site assembly) by our carpenters according to individual requirements.

quality_guaranteed.label: Quality Guarantee
quality_guaranteed.text: We offer a multi-year guarantee on our finished furniture, further proving its quality. We do not use low-quality materials that are often found in the carpentry industry.
